charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had come to the ruins
to look for fossils with Hilbert and Roark.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0300_1: Have you ever seen a Genesect fossil, Roark?
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0400_1:
I’ve heard rumors, but I’ve never seen one with
my own eyes.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0500_1:
If we could just figure out where Genesect lived
three hundred million years ago...
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0600_1:
The sand and soil that make up Pasio were
brought in from all over.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0700_1:
I thought maybe we could find some
Genesect fossils here, but...
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0800_1: Lesson one of fossil hunting: never give up!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_0900_1: I’ll look over there. I’m leaving this area to you!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1000_1: I’ll do my best for Genesect’s sake!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_0302_1300_1: Why are you hunting for fossils?
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_0402_1400_1: I want to make Genesect happy.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1500_1:
I want to reunite Genesect with its friends from
the past.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1600_1:
Ever since Genesect was restored from a fossil by
Team Plasma, it has endured so much hardship.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1700_1:
I wanted to do something for poor Genesect, and
this is what I came up with.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1800_1:
But, if someone like Roark has never seen one
before, this may be quite the challenge.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_1900_1:
It may be a long time before we can reunite
Genesect with its friends...
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_2100_1:
Until we find the fossils, I’ll think of other fun
things to do!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_2300_1:
Genesect was the strongest hunter of its
time. I’m sure it’ll be amazing in the world
of battling!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_2400_1: That is, of course, if it wants to.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_0301_2600_1:
You two are going to make an
extraordinary sync pair!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_0401_2700_1:
You bet! We’ll do our best to live up to
your expectations!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_0302_2800_1: I’m sure you’ll both be great!
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_3000_1: Genesect has endured so much until now...
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_3100_1: As its partner, I want to make it happy.
charaepi_ch0020_10_toya/2301_1201_3200_1: I’ll do whatever I can to make Genesect happy!
